ccre.concurrency

Class ReporterThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ccre.concurrency.ReporterThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CluckTCPClient, CollapsingWorkerThread, ConnectionReceiverThread, RLoadServer

    public abstract class ReporterThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A nice wrapper for the builtin Thread. Provides a system to prevent execution of the run outside of the target thread, provides an easy way to name the thread, provides a builtin handler for throwables, and provides an abstract method for the body of the thread.
    Author:
    skeggsc

        public ReporterThread(java.lang.String name)
